page.title: 14HEALTH PAISLEY
page.content: {Hawkhead}is a general hospital which has 10 wards{including paediatric, {medical,psycho-geriatric,gynaecology {and orthopaedic.}It has two{ {laboratories}for biochemistry and bacteriology. {Dykebar}copes with psychiatric and mentally disturbed patients. Its patients come from Renfrewshire and Eastwood,a total population of 250,000 The hospital has 100% certainty of full occupation all year round.55% of patients are{psycho-geriatric}and in future the hospital will cater for only this type of patient.Dykebar has many facilities for its patients- Chiropody suite,dentist,Hairdresser and recreational facilities. There are two therapy units-Occupational and Industrial. There is a{Rehabilitation- {Ward}for patients preparing to leave. { }
